title: Introducing: Macy Todd
body:
Beautifully classic soulful songwriting here from Atlanta’s **Macy Todd**, merging elements of the likes of Winehouse, Paloma Faith and Macy Gray.

Toeing the line perfectly between daringly over the top yet emotionally intimate, it’s hopefully a sign of far more to come. Check out _I’ve Got a Feelin’_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
